languages.text: "Если Вашей Светлости будет угодно, я предоставлю вам поштучный отчет и певчих с приятными голосами, которые зачитают его".
"If Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} wills, I can provide you with an itemised report and sweet-voiced servants to read it out."
languages.original_text: "Если Вашей Светлости будет угодно, я предоставлю вам поштучный отчет и певчих с приятными голосами, которые зачитают его".

traits.locale_text: "If your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} wills, I will provide you a report about every single item and sweet-sounding songbirds to read it out."
"If your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} wills, I will provide you a report about every single item and sweet-sounding songbirds to read it out."
"If Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} wills, I will provide you with an itemised report and sweet-sounding songbirds to read it out."
"If Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} wills, I will provide you with an itemised report and sweet-sounding songbirds to read it out."
"If Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} wills, I can provide you with an itemised report and sweet-voiced servants to read it out."

languages.text: “如果您愿意的话，我会为您提供一份更加详细的报告，让声音甜美的仆人为您朗读。”
languages.original_text: "If Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} wills, I can provide you with an itemised report and sweet-voiced servants to read it out."

traits.locale_text: “如果您愿意的话，我会为您提供一份更加详细的报告，让声音甜美的仆人为您朗读。”

languages.text: « Si Votre Seigneurie le souhaite, je peux fournir un rapport détaillé et des serviteurs à la voix douce pour le lire. »
languages.original_text: "If Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} wills, I can provide you with an itemised report and sweet-voiced servants to read it out."

traits.locale_text: « Si Votre Seigneurie le souhaite, je peux fournir un rapport détaillé et des serviteurs à la voix douce pour le lire. »

languages.text: "Sollte es Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} wünschen, werde ich einen detaillierten Bericht und Diener mit wohlklingenden Stimmen holen, um ihn vorlesen zu lassen."
languages.original_text: "If Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} wills, I can provide you with an itemised report and sweet-voiced servants to read it out."

traits.locale_text: "Sollte es Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} wünschen, werde ich einen detaillierten Bericht und Diener mit wohlklingenden Stimmen holen, um ihn vorlesen zu lassen."
"Sollte es Eure {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} wünschen, werde ich einen detaillierten Bericht und süßlich klingende Singvögel holen, um ihn vorlesen zu lassen."

languages.text: «{mf|Milord|Milady}, si así lo desea, podría proporcionarle un informe detallado leído por sirvientes con dulce voz».
languages.original_text: "If Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} wills, I can provide you with an itemised report and sweet-voiced servants to read it out."

traits.locale_text: «{mf|Milord|Milady}, si así lo desea, podría proporcionarle un informe detallado leído por sirvientes con dulce voz».

languages.text: 「陛下、ご意向とあらば、明細書と、それを読み上げる甘美な声の召使をご用意いたします」
languages.original_text: "If Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} wills, I can provide you with an itemised report and sweet-voiced servants to read it out."

traits.locale_text: 「陛下、ご意向とあらば、明細書と、それを読み上げる甘美な声の召使をご用意いたします」

languages.text: "{mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri, dilerseniz ayrıntılı bir rapor sunabiliriz. Kadife sesli hizmetkârlarınız sizin için okuyuverir."
languages.original_text: "If Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} wills, I can provide you with an itemised report and sweet-voiced servants to read it out."
